main event: Multiple unidentified flying objects were observed moving across the sky in an easterly direction and then hovering in New York City on 6 August 1957.
interesting points: The sightings lasted about fifty minutes,The objects were reported to have a steady bright white light,The sound associated with the objects was described as like loud thunder,The analysis suggested the sightings were probably satellites,Further investigation was not considered necessary.
sighted object: unidentified flying objects with a bright white light
location: New York City, New York, USA
witness description: no specific witnesses were mentioned in the report
